name: Dhokla
recipe: Khaman dhokla is a spongy Gujarati snack made with besan, spices, lemon juice & a leavening agent. Make the easiest & best dhokla at home.

recipe: When the seeds crackle, add the tomatoes, turmeric powder, coriander-cumin seeds powder, chilli powder, sugar and salt, mix well and simmer.
